description: Allows the player to create a shape (e.g., spiral) and ignite all entities that collide with it.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of burning in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).

cooldown.description: Specifies the cooldown of the ability.

name.description: Specifies the name of the ability.

particle.description: Specifies the particle used to create visual effects.
